mapper.select: SELECT ws.id,ws.sku_id,warehouse_id,stock_name,stock,stock_locked,wi.name as warehouse_name FROM ware_sku ws INNER JOIN ware_info wi ON ws.warehouse_id=wi.id
select sum(stock-IFNULL(stock_locked,0)) from ware_sku where sku_id=#{skuid}
select stock-IFNULL(stock_locked,0) as available_stock from ware_sku where sku_id=#{skuId} and warehouse_id=#{warehouseId} for update
mapper.update: UPDATE ware_sku SET stock_locked= IFNULL(stock_locked,0)+#{stockLocked} WHERE sku_id=#{skuId} and warehouse_id=#{warehouseId}
